content:
In this PR I change the definition of docs#free_monoid.lift such that its defining property docs#free_monoid.lift_eval_of is true by refl. More interestingly, this has the same effect on docs#tensor_product.

This makes it consistent with things like prod.rec, where prod.rec f (x, y) = f x y is also true definitionally.

Does this seem like a sensible goal?
